questions.question_text: Which of the following is not a general way graphs and charts are used?

options.A: ________ charts/graphs are visual representations of numerical values = Bar
options.B: ________charts are also referred to as sector charts = Pie
options.C: ________charts are used to represent small numbers of plotted values and to make a simple comparison of two values along two axes = Bar
options.D: ________ are used to compare large numbers of values in a compact space, to calculate values that fall between the plotted points, and to compare trends = X-Y graphs
